A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was expecting sooo much more from this movie. After seeing TFA you'd expect an epic follow up but what you  end up getting is a complete let down. The jokes in the movie were too corny and the story was bland. Who or what is snokes? The movie apparently never told you. Spoiler alert: the way luke dies is lame let him go out in an epic battle.  He is a master jedi a legend!!!! This is worse than episode 1.
